RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Animal Messenger
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: By means of this spell, you use an animal to deliver a message.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Barkskin
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature. The target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Beast Sense
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a willing beast, and for the duration of the spell, you can use your action to see through the beast's eyes and hear what it hears.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Cordon of Arrows
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You plant four pieces of nonmagical ammunition – arrows or crossbow bolts – in the ground within range and lay magic upon them to protect an area.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Darkvision
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Find Traps
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You sense the presence of any trap within range.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Lesser Restoration
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Locate Animals or Plants
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: Describe or name a specific kind of beast or plant.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Locate Object
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

RangerLevel2Spells.Name: Pass without Trace
RangerLevel2Spells.Description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection.
